ResourceHeader.Description: Purcell (PCEL) Magnetometer Station is located in Purcell, Oklahoma, USA.  It is one of the nine magnetometers of the Mid-continent MAgnetoseismic Chain (McMAC).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The operation of the Purcell fluxgate magnetometer is managed by Prof. Linda Winkler at University of Oklahoma.

InformationURL.Name: McMAC Purcell Station
InformationURL.Description: Information about the McMAC Purcell Ground Magnetometer Station
